auto_renewal.notice_to_cancel: 60 days prior to end of term

obligations.description: Pay monthly rent of $2,300 on the 1st of each month
obligations.source_text: Tenant agrees to pay Landlord monthly rent in the amount of Two Thousand Three Hundred Dollars ($2,300.00), due on the first (1st) day of each calendar month

obligations.description: Pay late fee of 10% plus $5/day if rent not received by 5th of month
obligations.conditions: If rent not received by 5th of month
obligations.source_text: If rent is not received by the fifth (5th) day of the month, Tenant shall pay a late fee of Ten Percent (10%) of the monthly rent amount, plus Five Dollars ($5.00) per day for each additional day the rent remains unpaid

obligations.description: Pay security deposit of $4,600 (two months rent) upon execution
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall pay a security deposit of Four Thousand Six Hundred Dollars ($4,600.00) upon execution of this Agreement, which equals two (2) months' rent

obligations.description: Pay non-refundable move-in fee of $500 and pet fee of $350 per pet
obligations.source_text: In addition to the security deposit, Tenant shall pay a non-refundable move-in fee of $500.00 and a non-refundable pet fee of $350.00 per pet

obligations.description: Pay all utilities including electricity, gas, water, sewer, garbage, internet, cable, telephone
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall be responsible for payment of all utilities, including but not limited to: electricity, gas, water, sewer, garbage collection, internet, cable television, and telephone services

obligations.description: Use premises for residential purposes only, no commercial or illegal use
obligations.source_text: The Premises shall be used solely for residential purposes and shall not be used for any commercial, business, or illegal purpose

obligations.description: No overnight guests staying more than 3 consecutive nights without written approval
obligations.source_text: No additional occupants or overnight guests staying more than three (3) consecutive nights are permitted without prior written approval from Landlord

obligations.description: No subletting, assigning, or transferring without prior written consent
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall not sublet, assign, or transfer this Agreement or any interest therein, nor permit any other person to occupy the Premises, without prior written consent from Landlord. Any unauthorized subletting shall result in immediate termination of this Agreement

obligations.description: Maintain premises in clean, sanitary condition and responsible for all repairs and maintenance
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall maintain the Premises in a clean, sanitary condition and shall be responsible for all repairs and maintenance, including but not limited to: plumbing fixtures, appliances, HVAC filters, light bulbs, smoke detector batteries, and any damage caused by Tenant or Tenant's guests

obligations.description: Reimburse landlord for repairs caused by tenant's negligence within 10 days of invoice
obligations.conditions: Repairs necessitated by Tenant's negligence or misuse
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall reimburse Landlord for any repairs necessitated by Tenant's negligence or misuse within ten (10) days of receiving an invoice. Failure to pay shall constitute a material breach of this Agreement

obligations.description: No alterations or improvements without prior written consent from Landlord
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall not make any alterations, additions, or improvements to the Premises without prior written consent from Landlord. Any approved alterations shall become the property of Landlord upon installation and shall not be removed by Tenant

obligations.description: Maintain renter's insurance with $100,000 liability and $50,000 personal property coverage
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall maintain renter's insurance with minimum coverage of $100,000 for personal liability and $50,000 for personal property throughout the lease term

obligations.description: Indemnify landlord for all claims arising from tenant's use of premises regardless of landlord negligence
obligations.source_text: Tenant shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Landlord, its agents, employees, and contractors from and against any and all claims, damages, losses, costs, and expenses (including reasonable attorneys' fees) arising out of or relating to Tenant's use or occupancy of the Premises, regardless of whether such claims arise from the negligence of Landlord

obligations.description: Pay early termination fee of 3 months rent plus forfeit security deposit if terminating early
obligations.conditions: If Tenant terminates before end of lease term
obligations.source_text: If Tenant terminates this Agreement before the end of the lease term, Tenant shall pay an early termination fee equal to three (3) months' rent plus forfeiture of the security deposit

obligations.description: Pay double rent (200%) if holding over without consent
obligations.conditions: If Tenant remains after lease expires without consent
obligations.source_text: If Tenant remains in possession after the lease term expires without Landlord's written consent, Tenant shall be liable for rent at double (200%) the then-current monthly rate, plus all damages suffered by Landlord

obligations.description: Get written approval for pets and pay applicable fees and deposits
obligations.source_text: Pets are only permitted with prior written approval from Landlord and payment of applicable pet fees and deposits

obligations.description: Provide 60 days written notice to terminate before end of current term
obligations.deadline: 60 days prior to end of term
obligations.source_text: This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one (1) year periods unless either party provides written notice of termination at least sixty (60) days prior to the end of the then-current term

obligations.description: Return security deposit less deductions within 90 days after tenant vacates
obligations.conditions: After Tenant vacates and returns all keys
obligations.source_text: The security deposit, less any deductions, shall be returned within ninety (90) days after Tenant vacates the Premises and returns all keys

risk_flags.title: Auto-renewal with 60-day notice requirement
risk_flags.description: Lease auto-renews for 1 year unless 60 days notice given - easy to miss deadline and get locked in for another year
risk_flags.source_text: This Agreement shall automatically renew for successive one (1) year periods unless either party provides written notice of termination at least sixty (60) days prior to the end of the then-current term

risk_flags.title: Excessive late fee (10% + $5/day)
risk_flags.description: Late fee of 10% plus $5/day is unusually harsh and may exceed legal limits in some jurisdictions
risk_flags.source_text: Tenant shall pay a late fee of Ten Percent (10%) of the monthly rent amount, plus Five Dollars ($5.00) per day for each additional day the rent remains unpaid

risk_flags.title: Landlord can increase rent anytime with 30 days notice
risk_flags.description: Landlord can raise rent at any time during the lease term with only 30 days notice - unusual mid-term rent increase clause
risk_flags.source_text: Landlord reserves the right to increase rent at any time during the lease term with thirty (30) days written notice to Tenant

risk_flags.title: Two months security deposit
risk_flags.description: Security deposit of 2 months rent ($4,600) is at the high end of typical deposits
risk_flags.source_text: Tenant shall pay a security deposit of Four Thousand Six Hundred Dollars ($4,600.00) upon execution of this Agreement, which equals two (2) months' rent

risk_flags.title: Landlord can use security deposit for any purpose
risk_flags.description: Overly broad security deposit usage rights including 'any other amounts owed' gives landlord excessive discretion
risk_flags.source_text: Landlord may use the security deposit for any purpose, including but not limited to: unpaid rent, cleaning costs, repair of damages beyond normal wear and tear, replacement of missing items, and any other amounts owed under this Agreement

risk_flags.title: 90-day security deposit return period
risk_flags.description: 90 days to return security deposit is much longer than typical 30-day requirement in most states
risk_flags.source_text: The security deposit, less any deductions, shall be returned within ninety (90) days after Tenant vacates the Premises and returns all keys

risk_flags.title: Landlord can enter at any time without notice
risk_flags.description: Landlord access without notice violates tenant privacy rights and may be illegal in many jurisdictions
risk_flags.source_text: Landlord or Landlord's agents may enter the Premises at any time without notice for any purpose, including but not limited to: inspection, repairs, showing the property to prospective tenants or buyers, or any other lawful purpose

risk_flags.title: Indemnification regardless of landlord negligence
risk_flags.description: Tenant must indemnify landlord even for landlord's own negligence - extremely one-sided
risk_flags.source_text: Tenant shall indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Landlord... from and against any and all claims... arising out of or relating to Tenant's use or occupancy of the Premises, regardless of whether such claims arise from the negligence of Landlord

risk_flags.title: Landlord can terminate immediately for any reason
risk_flags.description: Landlord can terminate without notice 'for any reason deemed appropriate by Landlord in its sole discretion' - completely one-sided
risk_flags.source_text: Landlord may terminate this Agreement immediately and without notice for any violation of this Agreement or for any reason deemed appropriate by Landlord in its sole discretion

risk_flags.title: Early termination fee of 3 months rent plus security deposit
risk_flags.description: Early termination penalty of 3 months rent ($6,900) plus forfeiture of $4,600 deposit = $11,500 total penalty
risk_flags.source_text: If Tenant terminates this Agreement before the end of the lease term, Tenant shall pay an early termination fee equal to three (3) months' rent plus forfeiture of the security deposit

risk_flags.title: Double rent for holdover
risk_flags.description: 200% rent penalty for staying past lease end is punitive
risk_flags.source_text: Tenant shall be liable for rent at double (200%) the then-current monthly rate, plus all damages suffered by Landlord

risk_flags.title: Jury trial waiver
risk_flags.description: Both parties waive right to jury trial
risk_flags.source_text: LANDLORD AND TENANT HEREBY WAIVE THEIR RESPECTIVE RIGHTS TO A JURY TRIAL IN ANY ACTION OR PROCEEDING ARISING OUT OF THIS AGREEMENT

risk_flags.title: Mandatory binding arbitration
risk_flags.description: All disputes must go to binding arbitration in Portland, OR
risk_flags.source_text: Any dispute arising out of or relating to this Agreement shall be resolved exclusively through binding arbitration administered by the American Arbitration Association in Portland, Oregon. The arbitrator's decision shall be final and binding

risk_flags.title: Class action waiver
risk_flags.description: Tenant waives right to participate in class action lawsuits
risk_flags.source_text: Tenant agrees that any dispute shall be brought in Tenant's individual capacity only, and not as a plaintiff or class member in any purported class or representative proceeding

risk_flags.title: Tenant waives all claims against landlord for property damage
risk_flags.description: Broad waiver of subrogation means tenant can't claim against landlord for any property damage including landlord negligence
risk_flags.source_text: Tenant hereby waives any and all claims against Landlord for damage to personal property arising from any cause whatsoever, including but not limited to: fire, theft, water damage, acts of God, or negligence of Landlord

key_definitions.definition: The residential property located at 1847 Maple Street, Unit 4B, Portland, OR 97205, including all fixtures, appliances, and improvements thereon

_annotation_notes: This lease contains numerous tenant-unfriendly provisions including: unlimited landlord entry rights, mid-term rent increases, one-sided termination rights, excessive penalties, and broad indemnification. Many clauses may be unenforceable under Oregon tenant protection laws.
